sentence.Network_en: In the worst-case scenario, you could become a homeless person.
sentence.Network_cn: 最坏的情况是你可能会无家可归。

sentence.Network_en: Discovering your child takes drugs is a nightmare scenario for most parents.
sentence.Network_cn: 对大多数父母来说，发现自己的孩子吸毒简直就是场噩梦。

sentence.Network_en: Let me suggest a possible scenario .
sentence.Network_cn: 我来设想一种可能出现的情况。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: from Italian, from Latin scena 'scene'

entry.def: If you talk about a likely or possible scenario, you are talking about the way in which a situation may develop.

example.ex: ...the nightmare scenario of a divided and irrelevant Royal Family...
example.tran: 对于王室四分五裂、无足轻重的可怕设想

example.ex: In the worst-case scenario, you could become a homeless person...
example.tran: 最坏的情况是你可能会无家可归。

entry.def: The scenario of a film is a piece of writing that gives an outline of the story.

means.word_mean: 1. an outline or synopsis of a play (or, by extension, of a literary work)
2. a setting for a work of art or literature;

sentences.sentence: "the scenario is France during the Reign of Terror"

means.word_mean: 3. a postulated sequence of possible events;

sentences.sentence: "planners developed several scenarios in case of an attack"

list.explanation: [军队用语]最坏的设想，未来的最糟结果或出路

example.en: In the worst-case scenario, we're all dead.
example.zh: 那最坏的设想是我们大家全部死光。

Sentence.sentence: This scenario is common in newsrooms that lack a systematic way to filter story suggestions.
Scientists agree that key player in this scenario is the West Antarctic ice sheet, a Brazil-size mass of frozen water that is much as 7000 feet thick.

means.word_mean: (电影、戏剧等的)剧情说明;脚本

sentences.en: This is an adaptation of a novel for the scenario.
sentences.cn: 这是由小说改编的电影剧本。

means.word_mean: (行动的)方案,纲要;(对可能出现的情况的)描述,推测

sentences.en: the nightmare scenario of mass unemployment
sentences.cn: 大规模失业的可怕情景

sentences.en: the scenario painted by some sections of the Western press
sentences.cn: 一部分西方媒体描绘出的情形

sentences.en: In a worst-case scenario, the disease will reach epidemic proportions.
sentences.cn: 最坏的情况是这种病流行开来。

sentences.en: The more likely scenario is that the president will resign and an election will be held.
sentences.cn: 局面更可能是：总统辞职，然后进行选举。
